elements.text:
You're working on a report with a few colleagues and need to report some statistics. A colleague suggests that you change the statistics so that your report looks better, but that would be lying.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I think that this information is important to share, even if the results are unexpected.
My supervisor may be disappointed with our results, but I can handle it.
I'll make a bad impression in front of my supervisor if I don't change the numbers.
Our findings are interesting and valuable on their own.
I may not put together the best presentation, but all I can do is try my best.
